unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Victini
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Snivy
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It is very intelligent and calm. Being exposed to sunlight makes its movements swifter.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Servine
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It can betwitch foes with a single glare. It is protected by a coat of leaves.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Serperior
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It can stop its opponents' movements with just a glare. It takes in solar energy and boosts it internally.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Tepig
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It can deftly dodge its foe's attacks while shooting fireballs from its nose. It roasts berries before it eats them.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Pignite
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow sharper and faster. When in a pinch, it will get smoke from its snout.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Emboar
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It can throw a fire punch by setting its fists on fire with its fiery chin. It cares deeply about its friends.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Oshawott
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It fights using the scalchop on its stomach. In response to an attack, it retaliates immediately by slashing.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Dewott
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It is a master of the scalchop. It can defeat foes with the dual-wielding scalchop techniques it learned through rigorous training.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Samurott
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: One swing of the seamitar on its arm can fell an opponent. A simple glare from this Pokémon is enough to intimidate most foes.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Patrat
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It is a very cautious Pokémon. It stands on its tail to get a better view of its surroundings.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Watchog
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It makes the patterns on its body glow to startle predators. It can see in the dark.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Lillipup
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It is a brave Pokémon. It is said that it can stand up to foes much bigger than itself.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Herdier
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It has been living with people for a long time. It is a very loyal and obedient Pokémon.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Stoutland
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It is a very wise Pokémon. It is an expert at rescuing people stranded at sea or in the mountains.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Purrloin
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It steals things from people just to see the looks on their faces. It is a very fickle Pokémon.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Liepard
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It has a beautiful coat of fur. It is a very fickle Pokémon, and it is said that it is difficult to befriend.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Pansage
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It shares the leaf on its head with weary-looking Pokémon. These leaves are known to relieve stress.
unova_pokedex_part_1.evolution: Evolves into Simisage with a Leaf Stone.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Simisage
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It is a poor fighter, but it can make its opponents flinch with its thorned tail.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Pansear
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It can roast berries with the tuft on its head. It is said that it can reach 600 degrees Fahrenheit.
unova_pokedex_part_1.evolution: Evolves into Simisear with a Fire Stone.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Simisear
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It loves sweets. It uses the fire on its head to toast and eat berries.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Panpour
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. It waters plants with its tail.
unova_pokedex_part_1.evolution: Evolves into Simipour with a Water Stone.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Simipour
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It can shoot water from its tail. It can put out a fire with a single shot.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Munna
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: This Pokémon eats the dreams of people and Pokémon. When it eats a good dream, it releases a pink mist.
unova_pokedex_part_1.evolution: Evolves into Musharna with a Moon Stone.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Musharna
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: The mist emanating from its forehead is packed with the dreams of people and Pokémon.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Pidove
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It is a very forgetful Pokémon. It may forget its Trainer's orders and wait for new ones.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Tranquill
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It can fly for miles without rest. It is said that deep in the forests where Tranquill live, there is a peaceful place where there is no conflict.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Unfezant
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: Males swing their head plumage to threaten foes. Females are better at flying.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Blitzle
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: When lightning strikes, it catches the charge and stores it in its mane.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Zebstrika
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It has explosive speed. It can run as fast as a lightning bolt.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Roggenrola
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It was discovered in a layer of earth that was formed 100 years ago. Its body is made of the same materials as the earth's core.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Boldore
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: Because its energy was too great to be contained, the energy leaked out and formed orange crystals.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Gigalith
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It can compress the energy from the sun's rays and fire it from its mouth.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Woobat
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It lives in forests and caves. It produces ultrasonic waves from its nose to search for prey.
unova_pokedex_part_1.evolution: Evolves into Swoobat with high Happiness.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Swoobat
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It produces sound waves of various frequencies from its nose. It can use them to knock out its prey.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Drilbur
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It can dig through the ground at a speed of 30 mph. It has a rivalry with Diglett.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Excadrill
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has the power to cut through iron plates.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Audino
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It has a caring nature. It will use its feelers to assess the health of people and Pokémon.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Timburr
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It is always carrying a log. If it can lift its log without falling, it is ready to evolve.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Gurdurr
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It is so muscular that it can't be moved by a group of ordinary people. It is a master of construction.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Conkeldurr
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It is said that it taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Tympole
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It warns others of danger by vibrating its cheeks to create a high-pitched sound.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Palpitoad
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It lives on land and in water. It hunts by using the bumps on its head to create waves.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Seismitoad
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It increases the power of its punches by vibrating the bumps on its fists.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Throh
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: When it tightens its belt, it becomes stronger. Wild Throh use vines to weave their own belts.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Sawk
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: The sound of Sawk punching trees and rocks can be heard all the way from the mountains.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Sewaddle
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It makes clothes for itself from leaves. The younger the Sewaddle, the better its sewing.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Swadloon
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It protects itself from the cold by wrapping up in a leaf. It moves on the forest floor by wriggling.
unova_pokedex_part_1.evolution: Evolves into Leavanny with high Happiness.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Leavanny
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It makes clothes for small Pokémon. It uses its arms to measure and cut leaves.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Venipede
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It discovers things with its antennae. It has a vicious nature, so it is best to stay away.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Whirlipede
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It is usually motionless, but when attacked, it rotates at high speed and then crashes into its foe.

unova_pokedex_part_1.name: Scolipede
unova_pokedex_part_1.description: It is very aggressive. It chases down foes with its powerful legs, then attacks with the claws on its neck.
